review: The consultation was for my mother as she was not feelin well so we took the appointment through Practo & as we reached the hospital we immediately got to meet the doctor the doctor was very kind & nice I am totally satisfied with the consultation my Mom is doing all fine now

My pregnancy journey was with her since my 8th month and there were absolutely no complications throughout. She recommended ultrasound in 36 week of pregnancy but after that she didn't suggest any ultrasound till my labour in 39 week. My baby weight was 3.8 kgs at the time of delivery. I will never recommend Dr. Ila although it was a normal delivery, ******* ** *** ************ ** **** *** **** ***** *** *** *** * **** **** ** ********* This utmost painful experience to see my newborn go through all this can never ** ******** ** forgotten by any parent ever!

Thanks to her we have a thalasemia major baby. There was negligence in reading my wife's HPLC report, she is thalasemia minor, me being husband my test was expected to be recommended, which didnot happen.

I had done my laproscopic surgery (ectopic pregnancy ) through Dr Ila Mam. I had only heared about her that she is vry nice Dr but when I contact with her then I realised that she is not only nice she is vry supporting , understanding, polite and vry good adviser my first exp. With her is vry nice and vry satisfied.  Thank u mam for ur all support.
